00020 #ifndef RDK2_GEOMETRY_POSENORMALDIST
00021 #define RDK2_GEOMETRY_POSENORMALDIST
00022 
00023 #include "dmatrix.h"
00024 #include "point.h"
00025 
00026 namespace RDK2 { namespace Geometry {
00027 
00028 struct PoseNormalDist {
00029     Point2od mu;
00030     DMatrix<double> sigma;
00031     
00032     PoseNormalDist(): sigma(3,3) {}
00033     PoseNormalDist(const Point2od& mu, const DMatrix<double>& xy_cov, double th_cov);
00034     
00035     double getThetaCov() { return sigma[2][2]; }
00036     DMatrix<double> getXYCov() { return sigma.aPieceOfYou(0,0,2,2); }
00037 };
00038 
00039 PoseNormalDist addNormalDist(const PoseNormalDist&, const PoseNormalDist&);
00040 
00041 }} // ns
00042 
00043 #endif
